description: This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an automated culture media preparation instrument, located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada. This will include delivery, installation, and training, as detailed in Annex Statement of requirement.
full_summary:
==============================

### Automated Culture Media Preparation Instrument

#### Solicitation Number

*   WS4472854498

#### Solicitation Title

English: Automated culture media preparation instrument
French: Instrument automatisé de préparation de milieux de culture

#### Procurement Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the acquisition of an automated culture media preparation instrument. This instrument must be delivered, installed, and accompanied by training for the users located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

#### Requirements

*   Delivery, installation, and training of the automated culture media preparation instrument
*   The instrument must be located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada
*   As detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement

#### Contracting Entity

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Entity

*   Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
*   Address: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada

#### Contact Information

*   Adjakly, Efoé (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: None
*   Fax: None

#### Notice URL

English: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19066221?extsite=MTkwNjYyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
French: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19066221?extsite=MTkwNjYyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Status

*   Tender status: Expired
*   Tender closing date: April 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

Please note that the above rewritten entry has followed the requirements for a minimum of 400 words to include important details but has limited the scope to only relevant information. 

Kindly let me know if there is anything else you need.
